---
id: edit-a-message
title: "Edit a message"
description: "The ZIM server supports developers to edit sent one-to-one or group chat messages."
api: 
info_path: core_products/zim/en/docs_zim_server/Messaging/open-api-desc
---

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Edit a message</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/"}></MethodEndpoint>


The ZIM server supports developers to edit sent one-to-one or group chat messages.

After successfully editing a message, the [message sent callback](/zim-server/callbacks/message-sent) will be triggered. At the same time, the message receiving user can receive the message edited notification through the following ZIM SDK callback interfaces.

| iOS-25% | Android-25% | macOS-25% | Windows-25% |
|-----|---------|-------|---------|
| [messageEdited](https://www.zegocloud.com/docs/article/api?doc=zim_API~objective-c_ios~protocol~ZIMEventHandler#zim-message-edited) | [onMessageEdited](https://www.zegocloud.com/docs/article/api?doc=zim_API~java_android~class~ZIMEventHandler#on-message-edited) | [messageEdited](https://www.zegocloud.com/docs/article/api?doc=zim_API~objective-c_macos~protocol~ZIMEventHandler#zim-message-edited) | [onMessageEdited](https://www.zegocloud.com/docs/article/api?doc=zim_API~cpp_windows~class~ZIMEventHandler#on-message-edited) |

| Web-25% | Mini Program-25% | Flutter-25% | React Native-25% |
|---------|-----|--------|--------------|
| [messageEdited](https://www.zegocloud.com/docs/article/api?doc=zim_API~javascript_web~interface~ZIMEventHandler#message-edited) | [messageEdited](https://www.zegocloud.com/docs/article/api?doc=zim_API~javascript_wxxcx~interface~ZIMEventHandler#message-edited) | [onMessageEdited](https://pub.dev/documentation/zego_zim/latest/zego_zim/ZIMEventHandler/onMessageEdited.html) | [messageEdited](https://www.zegocloud.com/docs/article/api?doc=zim_API~javascript_react-native~interface~ZIMEventHandler#message-edited) |

| uni-app \| uni-app x-25% | HarmonyOS-25% |
|---------|---------|
|[messageEdited](https://www.zegocloud.com/docs/article/api?doc=zim_API~javascript_uni-app~interface~ZIMEventHandler#message-edited) | [messageEdited](https://www.zegocloud.com/docs/article/api?doc=zim_API~javascript_harmony~interface~ZIMEventHandler#message-edited) |

<Note title="Note">
A single call can only modify one message in one conversation at a time.<br/>
By default, only messages sent within 24 hours are supported. If you need to edit earlier historical messages, please contact ZEGOCLOUD Technical Support for configuration.
</Note>

<Note title="QPS Limit"> 20 times/s</Note>

## Request

Refer to [Signature example](/zim-server/accessing-server-apis#signature-example) for how to generate.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"Timestamp","in":"query","description":"ðŸ’¡Public parameter. Current Unix timestamp, in seconds. Refer to [Signature example](/zim-server/accessing-server-apis#signature-example) for how to generate, with a maximum error of 10 minutes.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"SignatureVersion","in":"query","description":"ðŸ’¡Public parameter. Signature version number.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","default":"2.0","enum":["2.0"]}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"Signature","in":"query","description":"ðŸ’¡Public parameter. <MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime request"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json-schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details mime"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-mime"}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-body"}>Body</h3><strong className={"openapi-schema__required"}>required</strong></summary><ul className={"request-schema-first-body-node-container"}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"FromUserId"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** `<= 32 characters`"} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Message editing user ID.\n> **Note**\n>\n> When editing group chat messages, this user needs to be a member of the target group.\n","maxLength":32,"example":"editer"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"SenderId"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** `<= 32 characters`"} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Message sender ID.\n- Required when editing one-to-one messages.\n- Optional when editing group chat messages.\n","maxLength":32,"example":"sender"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"ConvId"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** `<= 32 characters`"} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Conversation ID.\n- When editing one-to-one messages, fill in the userID of the other participating user.\n- When editing group chat messages, fill in the groupID of the target group.\n","maxLength":32,"example":"conv_id_007"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"MsgType"} required={true} schemaName={"number"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"number","description":"Message type. Supports the following values:\n- 1: Text.\n- 10: Combined.\n- 200: Custom.\n","example":200}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"ConvMsgSeq"} required={true} schemaName={"number"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"number","description":"Message Seq. How to obtain:\n- To edit a message sent by the **client**, obtain MsgSeq through the [message sent callback](/zim-server/callbacks/message-sent).\n- To edit a **one-to-one** message sent by the server-side API [SendPeerMessage](/zim-server/messaging/send-a-one-to-one-message), obtain MsgSeq through the API response data.\n- To edit a **group chat** message sent by the server-side API [SendGroupMessage](/zim-server/messaging/send-group-messages), obtain MsgSeq through the API response data.\n","example":110}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"EditType"} required={true} schemaName={"number"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"number","description":"Edit type. Supports the following values:\n- 1: EM_MSG (edit message content), i.e., modify the Message field in MessageBody. In this case, Message cannot be empty.\n- 2: EM_PAYLOAD (edit message extended content), i.e., modify the ExtendedData field in MessageBody. In this case, ExtendedData can be empty.\n- 4: EM_AT (edit message mention attributes), i.e., modify AtListInfo or IsAtAll. In this case, both AtListInfo and IsAtAll can be empty.\n- 8: EM_AT_ALL (edit whether to mention all users), i.e., modify IsAtAll.\n- 16: EM_SUBMSGTYPE (edit custom message type), i.e., modify subMsgType. In this case, MsgType needs to be 200.\n\nYou can perform bitwise operations on any of the above values to edit multiple attributes of a message at the same time. For example, 3: select both EM_MSG and EM_PAYLOAD to modify the Message and ExtendedData fields in MessageBody.\n","example":31}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"MessageBody"} required={false} schemaName={"object"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"object","description":"Required when EditType includes EM_MSG or EM_PAYLOAD.\nFor the structure of this parameter, please refer to the Message and ExtendedData field descriptions in text messages, combined messages, and custom messages in [MessageBody description](/zim-server/messaging/messagebody-introduction).\n","example":{"Message":"edit msg","ExtendedData":"extend data"}}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"}><summary style={{}}><span className={"openapi-schema__container"}><strong className={"openapi-schema__property"}>AtListInfo</strong><span className={"openapi-schema__name"}> object</span></span></summary><div className={"schema-description-container"}><div className={"schema-description"}>List of users to be mentioned. Required when EditType includes EM_AT.</div><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"AtList"} required={false} schemaName={"string[]"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"array","description":"At list, user IDs, can be empty","items":{"type":"string"}}}></SchemaItem></div></details></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"IsAtAll"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether all users are mentioned. Required when EditType includes EM_AT_ALL.","example":false}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"SubMsgType"} required={false} schemaName={"number"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"number","description":"Custom message type, defined by you, with a value range of [0, 200]. Required when EditType includes EM_SUBMSGTYPE.","example":101}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem></MimeTabs>
